WorkItem.Description:
Hi Bart,
 
Your project adds tremendous value to Sharepoint development!
In trying my teeth on it I was able to create the spmetal file for accessing lists on a remote WSS3 server (albeit with empty Ids) but I was unable to generate the Linq Entities.
My dev environment is Win2003 SR1 with sp2 - running VS2008 Pro (RTM). I have copied your dlls to GAC per your instructions and downloaded the latest WSS SDK.
 
Regards,
 
Dimitris Foukas
WorkItem.Summary: Unable to run the LINQtoSharePointGenerator tool
